title: Thunder Group SLSFP009, 9-1/2 Inches Stainless Steel Fry Pan, Professional Frying Pan
features: A perfect solution for frying meat or seafood, sauteing vegetables, quickly making fajitas, omelets, pasta dishes, pancakes, and more, this versatile frying pan is a great choice for any home or commercial kitchen.
With a shallow, curved wall design and sturdy stainless steel construction, this professional fry pan ensures an easy stirring and prevents steam from forming in the pan.
This versatile stir-fry pan features a smooth, uncoated natural satin finish that provides better browning and searing of foods than comparable pans with non-stick surfaces.

Thanks to its long handle, this fry pan provides a secure grip while keeping your hands away from heat and its hanging hole allows for easy storage.Â The pan will easily withstand the rigors of frequent commercial grade use.
Dimensions: 9-1/2" diameter; 3.5 mm thick. NSF approved.
description: This versatile commercial grade fry pan is the perfect solution for quickly making fajitas, omelettes, pasta dishes, and everything in between! With a shallow, curved wall design and reliable stainless steel construction, this professional fry pan allows for easy stirring and prevents steam from forming in the pan. This amazing stir-fry pan features a smooth, uncoated natural satin finish that provides better browning and searing of foods than comparable pans with non-stick surfaces. This pan is great for frying, searing, browning, and sauteing. The pan will easily withstand the rigors of frequent commercial grade use. This 9.5" fry pan is ideal for those restaurants, caterers, and food services that require and demand a tough, durable pan.
